attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to mp there are lots of empty office blocks in or near town centers would be cheaper to turn them in to flats for home less people and to cut houseing list down the council in newbury berks have turned 2 shops in flats you realy dont have to build new houses each year 
if i can come with this surly the goverment can put it in place it would work plus it would cut muging and begers of the streets

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
